Staff Member Patreon Bronze Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/oby-adventure/id6670377376 This is part 1 of a 6 part series. The first two levels are free with an in-app to purchase the rest. Oby Adventure EMBARK ON AN EPIC JOURNEY WITH OBY ADVENTURE! Dive into the vibrant and immersive world of Oby Adventure, a classic two-… DetailsEMBARK ON AN EPIC JOURNEY WITH OBY ADVENTURE! Dive into the vibrant and immersive world of Oby Adventure, a classic two-dimensional platform game set in a stunning 3D environment. Experience a grand adventure filled with vivid colors, captivating levels, and an unforgettable soundtrack that will keep you hooked for hours. Whether you're a seasoned platformer enthusiast or a newcomer to the genre, Oby Adventure offers a perfect blend of nostalgia and modern gameplay. Play Oby Adventure solo and immerse yourself in an epic journey, or challenge your friends and players from around the globe! UNCOVER THE MYSTERY OF THE FRUITIMAL KINGDOM The once peaceful Fruitimal Kingdom is under siege. Rumors are swirling about the return of the menacing Draco. The kingdom's only hope lies in gathering ancient artefacts to unlock a powerful force known as the Source. Join Oby on a perilous quest to collect these artefacts, restore the kingdom, and save all the fruitimals from impending doom. The fate of the Fruitimal Kingdom rests in your hands! EXPERIENCE THE THRILL OF OBY ADVENTURE! This release of Oby Adventure is the first of five parts. It includes six captivating levels and an epic boss fight, along with bonus content and extra challenges. Try out the first two levels for free! If you’re hooked and want to continue the adventure, you can unlock the full experience with an in-app purchase. Download now and embark on your journey! CONTROLS Oby Adventure fully supports Game Controllers and Hardware Keyboards. The virtual controls will hide when an external input device is connected. See below for controls: — Game Controller — D-pad: Left D-pad Button 1: Primary action button Button 2: Secondary action button Menu/Pause: Menu button — Hardware Keyboard — D-pad: Arrow keys Button 1: X Button 2: Z Menu/Pause: Return/Enter GRAPHICS AND PERFORMANCE Please note that the quality of graphics and effects in Oby Adventure may vary depending on your device. We strive to provide the best experience possible, but performance may differ across various device models. I’ll buy the full game when I reach that point for sure. Just don’t the first main level which was really good. One of the best platformers I’ve played recently Staff Member Patreon Silver Loved Paper Monsters, but this is way more polished. The level of inventiveness is pretty impressive, too. Oh way more polished. Just some of it reminds me of paper monsters a bit. Gonna play much more later. Love platformers and this is one of the best so far ColeDaddy Silver Supporter
Moderator Staff Member Patreon Silver Patreon Gold Patreon Bronze I bought the IAP after completing the first level. Very well made game. I prefer 2D v 3D platformers but this is something really special. The transitions within levels is cool. Reached the end so need to wait for the next part to be released. Very polished. Lots of variety to the levels. Bit surprised the other sections aren’t released yet Share This Page
